Question.Subject: Internet explorer screen too big?
Question.Content: I reformatted by computer and now my internet explorer is too big. My screen size is set at 100% and text size is at medium. It is only internet explorer. My desktop is not enlarged. Anyway to solve this? Thanks When I use ctrl or minimize it, only the breadth changes and words becomes too small to read. The length is still the same and I have to keep scrolling down
Question.ChosenAnswer: I think you have the standard resolution which should be fine . otherwise you can try minimizing you screen resolution like 1024x768 or smthg like that . hope this helps Jaly aka the badass

Answer.Content: I think you have the standard resolution which should be fine . otherwise you can try minimizing you screen resolution like 1024x768 or smthg like that . hope this helps Jaly aka the badass
Hold down the "Ctrl" key and then move the scroller on your mouse to adjust the size of the screen.
Answer.Reference: This happened to me a few times.

Answer.Content: try changing the zoom level in your internet explorer
